title: Police Equipment Funding
summary: An ordinance to allocate additional funds for police equipment and training to improve public safety readiness.

title: Reduce Police Budget
summary: An ordinance proposing to reduce funding for law enforcement departments and redirect it to community programs.

title: Teacher Salary Increase
summary: An ordinance to increase the salaries of public school teachers across the city to address retention issues.

title: School Funding Cut
summary: An ordinance proposing budget cuts for public schools to reduce overall city spending.

title: Small Business Tax Relief
summary: An ordinance providing tax incentives to small businesses to promote local economic growth and job creation.

title: Corporate Tax Increase
summary: An ordinance to increase corporate taxes on large businesses to fund social services.

title: Library Renovation
summary: An ordinance approving funding for public library renovations to improve access to community resources.

title: Park Maintenance Initiative
summary: An ordinance to enhance and maintain public parks and recreation facilities throughout the city.

title: Neighborhood Watch Expansion
summary: An ordinance to expand the cityâ€™s neighborhood watch program in collaboration with local police.

title: Restrict Surveillance Usage
summary: An ordinance limiting the use of public surveillance cameras by law enforcement.

title: STEM Education Grant
summary: An ordinance establishing grants for schools to promote STEM learning and after-school programs.

title: Limit Charter School Growth
summary: An ordinance restricting the expansion of charter schools in favor of funding public education programs.

title: Affordable Housing Incentive
summary: An ordinance offering developers incentives to include affordable housing units in new projects.

title: Real Estate Speculation Tax
summary: An ordinance imposing taxes on vacant commercial properties to discourage speculation.

title: City Employee Retirement Reform
summary: An ordinance modifying pension contribution rates for city employees to balance the city budget.

title: Green Energy Procurement
summary: An ordinance to transition all city buildings to renewable energy providers by 2030.

title: Public Safety Recruitment Drive
summary: An ordinance to fund a recruitment campaign to increase the number of trained emergency responders.

title: Reduce Fire Department Overtime
summary: An ordinance reducing overtime pay for fire department personnel to lower city operational costs.

title: Universal Preschool Initiative
summary: An ordinance establishing free preschool access for all residents to promote early education.

title: Eliminate School Nutrition Funding
summary: An ordinance cutting funding for public school lunch programs to reduce spending.

title: Tech Startup Accelerator Program
summary: An ordinance launching a startup incubator to promote innovation and local job growth.

title: Business Licensing Fee Increase
summary: An ordinance raising annual business licensing fees to generate additional city revenue.

title: Public Art Initiative
summary: An ordinance establishing grants to support local artists and public mural projects.

title: Citywide Noise Regulation
summary: An ordinance introducing noise limits for construction and nightlife venues.
